form.name: caring_for_the_cord
form.page_subtitle: CWC Counselling: Home Care for the Child> Caring for the Cord

field.name: Clean the cord with only methylated spirit twice a day until the wound heals. Avoid applying other substances like shea butter and dusting powder.
Cord should be exposed and not be covered. This will allow quicker air drying. Cord will detach by itself between 7-21 days after delivery.
home_care_for_the_child/giving home care for the infant.PNG
